document_data.name: Axe of Mirabar
document_data.symbol: A deep red double-bladed axe with a pointed haft and a flaring, flat base on a black field
document_data.mainbody: The '''Axe of Mirabar''' was the two-thousand strong militia of [[Mirabar]], consisting of [[human]]s and five hundred [[dwarves]].
document_data.Activities: The Axe was responsible for keeping the mines of Mirabar clear of monsters.
document_data.Possessions: Its members wore the crest of Mirabar (a deep-red double-bladed axe with a pointed haft and a flaring, flat base on a black field) on their shield or armor. They fought with [[crossbow]]s, [[lance]]s, and [[hammer]]s, riding [[Horse#Mountain pony|mountain ponies]], and [[rothé]] in the winter.
document_data.Members: New members had to take an oath to protect the [[Marchion]] of Mirabar.
